akn:section.akn:heading: Applicability of provisions of this chapter

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Preliminary Investigation With Respect to Certain Covered Persons.—

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Attorney General shall conduct a preliminary investigation in accordance with section 592 whenever the Attorney General receives information sufficient to constitute grounds to investigate whether any person described in subsection (b) may have violated any Federal criminal law other than a violation classified as a Class B or C misdemeanor or an infraction.
(b) The persons referred to in subsection (a) are—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Preliminary Investigation With Respect to Other Persons.—
Examination of Information to Determine Need for Preliminary Investigation.—
